tasks.task: Growing medicinal plants in a backyard garden.
subtasks: Understand the benefits of growing medicinal plants.
Identify various parts of plants used for medicine (seeds, flowers, leaves, roots, bark, fruit).
Learn about the holistic nature of plant medicine.
Explore the versatility of plant medicine for chronic and acute conditions.
Recognize the portability and long-term usability of prepared medicinal plants.
Prepare a planting bed suited for medicinal herbs.
Research and select appropriate plant varieties (e.g., correct species vs. cultivars).
Learn when to harvest different plant parts (leaves, flowers, roots).
Dry herbs for long-term storage (e.g., hanging bundles, air drying).
Create infused oils using fresh or dried herbs.
Prepare tinctures using alcohol to extract herbal medicine.
Store prepared remedies properly for optimal longevity.
